body.name: Classic Mini Retro Game Console, Plug & Play Video Game Console Built-in 620 Classic Games, Old-School Gaming System, Ideal Surprising Gift for Valentine/Birthday/Thanksgiving
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 20 hrs 33 mins
features: 【CLASSIC CONSOLE】This retro TV video game console is very popular TV game console in the1980s and built-in 620 different games and you can easily find 30-40 games that are part of your favorite classic game. The tv games are full of challenging, fun and bringing you back to Childhood Memories instantly.

【Promote Parent-Child Communication】Are you still worried about how to communicate with your child? Then you should choose the interactive game comsoles, it allow your child to experience the growth of their parents and happiness，enhance the communication and feeling between parents and children.

【Wired Handle, PLUG & PLAY】This 620 retro game console set including with 2 Wired Handles and controller. After connecting the handle to the mini console, you just need to plug it into the TV AV input port and use the charger to connect the console to the power source , then you would enjoy the games endlessly.
【AV Display】This mini classic video game console support AV connection,and suitable for pluging it into TVs,computer monitors,projectors with AV Output interface.

【 IDEAL GIFTS】The 620 mini classic game console is perfect as a birthday/Christmas/Thanksgiving/Halloween/gift for all ages - allowing them to build happy memories. Or play with the whole family to create new memories.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Retro Video Game Console – Bringing Back to The Childhood Hours Built-in 620 Games with 2 Controllers, 8-Bit Video Old-School Classic Gaming System, Ideal Surprise for Adults and Kids. It is a good choice to share endless moments of fun and a classic gaming experience with your loved ones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would give 5 stars if the console actually had Paperboy on it. Disappointed 😞
reviews.reviewText: This was given to me as a gift because I am a female firefighter and Nintendo classic games are one of the few things which help me relieve stress. There are sooooo many games listed on the packing list which are not on the actual console. But the biggest disappointment was "Paperboy" not being on it. This was the sole reason for the purchase. If a console with only Paperboy and Mario were sent to me, I would honestly give it 5 stars. I AM ABSOLUTELY HEARTBROKEN AND HAVE NO USE FOR THE GAME CONSOLE. IT IS CURRENTLY SITTING ON THE FLOOR IN THE CORNER OF THE BROOM CLOSET. WHAT A WASTE! 😔
Les graphiques sont parfois floues avec certains jeux.
